content: rainbow red sun hat this is the first in a series of hats designed during the coronavirus pandemic of 2020 the complete series includes one hat in each colour of the rainbow a symbol representing hope during a dark time in our lives made bearable by the spirit of resilience and fellow feeling of family friends neighbours and complete strangers knit in cotton dk yarn this hat is quite straightforward and suitable for a confident beginner it is available in 5 sizes baby toddler child average adult large adult it includes instructions for alternative flowers sizes materials
